subtitleNullable: Five Pokemon generations, overworld, sugimori, icons and conquest images.
descriptionNullable:
There are five main folders in zip file: conquest, icons, main-sprites, overworld and sugimori. main-sprites contain 12 subfolders for different generations. Also, some folders have female, male, left, and right subfolders. Each image file has a name of their id.

The csv file contains pokemon names and their types with hp, attack etc. additional information.
Use it in order to label each image files according to their id names: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/rounakbanik/pokemon

Note 1: The csv file that has pokemon types is on my github repo.
Note 2: Be aware of 0.png because it is a pokemon egg and there is no type for it.

The original zip file contents can be found at: https://veekun.com/dex/downloads

My work on this data: https://github.com/rabiaedayilmaz/PokeType
